titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to suspend the inclusion in gross income of Social Security benefits.
A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to suspend the inclusion in gross income of Social Security benefits.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: This bill suspends the inclusion in gross income, for income tax purposes, of Social Security benefits in 2020.
